name: max
description: The program should find the max element of the array b and assign it to m.
precondition: N > 0 && n = N && eqArrs(b, B, N)
postcondition: (A k : 0 <= k < N : m >= B[k]) && contains(B, m, 0, N-1)
invariants: 1 <= i <= n && n = N && eqArrs(b, B, N) && (A k : 0 <= k < i : m >= B[k]) && contains(B, m, 0, i-1)

shorthands.name: contains
shorthands.definition: (E k : from <= k <= to : arr[k] = x)
